Label: XML
Comment: "San Marino fixed-line numbers have an area code of ""0549"". However, this seems to be\noptional when dialling from outside the country
column4: the phone number can be reached both with\nand without this area code. The nationalPrefixForParsing and nationalPrefixTransformRule\nare used to ensure that if the 0549 is not present, it will be added."

Label: XML_FIXED_LINE
Comment: "Example numbers provided by the Telecommunications Services."
